Julian Rosen

I am a fixed-term assistant professor (postdoc) at the University of Maine, in the department of Mathematics & Statistics. My research is in number theory, arithmetic algebraic geometry, and related fields, and I am particularly interested in motives and motivic Galois theory.

I am on the job market, searching for a tenure-track job starting in the Fall of 2021.
